In relationships, â€œMHâ€ is a sweet term of endearment that people use to express love , affection, or admiration toward their partner. It can also be used in a more lighthearted manner if they find something cute or adorable. Since â€œMHâ€ is a slang term, reserve it for online communications with your friends, family members, or romantic partner. steps.content: Medical history If youâ€™re in the healthcare industry, â€œMHâ€ might be short for â€œmedical history.â€ This generally includes information about a patientâ€™s past surgical history, family medical history, medication history, pre existing conditions, allergies, and more. steps.title: Malignant hyperthermia
steps.content: Malignant hyperthermia In the medical field, â€œMHâ€ may stand for â€œmalignant hyperthermia,â€ which is a life-threatening reaction to certain anesthesia medications. Symptoms vary, but they can include a dangerously high body temperature, unexplained increase in heart rate, rapid breathing, muscle rigidity, spasms, seizures, and other problems. [5] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source
